data.eml:eml: A record of Notostraca on Socotra Island and the importance of local conservation of the habitat

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Damme, Kay Van (2018): A record of Notostraca on Socotra Island and the importance of local conservation of the habitat. Zootaxa 4446 (4): 555-566, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4446.4.8
